subject: DebianArtwork portal
body:
Hi !I'm designing the DebianArtwork portal and need ideas for content. The idea is use for contest, creating an archive of user contributed artwork that can be freely used. It will be used by Debian Developers for select the artwork for his applications.
Initially the categories are:- Wallpapers- Splash Screens- GDM - KDM - Window Decorations- Applications Themes- Colors schemes- Debian Installer
- Icon Themes- Usplash- Splashy- isolinux- Systems sounds
- Fonts- ScreenshotsWhat about these? Some ideas?Thanks!-- Andre Luiz Rodrigues Ferreira (si0ux) <
andrelrf@gmail.com> *******************************************************************Orlandia - SP - Brazil
